```{css, echo=FALSE}
* {
  font-family: Arial !important;
}

.column2 {
  float: left;
  width: 50%;

}

  float: left;
  width: 80%;
}

  float: left;

}

.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}

.titledate {
  background-color:#81358D;
  color:#FFFFFF;
}

.titledate:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}
```

```{r, include = F}

nomis_data <- data.table(labourmarketreports::lm_data_nomis_example())
```
